Respiratory Tract Diseases/Lung Diseases/Lung Diseases, Obstructive/Pulmonary Disease, Chronic Obstructive/Bronchitis, Chronic
Record.Description: A subcategory of CHRONIC OBSTRUCTIVE PULMONARY DISEASE. The disease is characterized by hypersecretion of mucus accompanied by a chronic (more than 3 months in 2 consecutive years) productive cough. Infectious agents are a major cause of chronic bronchitis.
